text: The India International Exchange Limited (India INX) is India's first international stock exchange. It is located at the International Financial Services Centre (IFSC), GIFT City in Gujarat. It is a subsidiary of BSE Limited. It was inaugurated by Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi on 9 January 2017. The trading operations began on 16 January 2017. It operates on EUREX T7, an advanced technology platform. It is the world's fastest exchange, with a turn-around time of 4 microseconds. It operates 22 hours a day, six days a week. These timings facilitate international investors and Non-Resident Indians to trade from anywhere across the globe at their preferred timings.The Daily Volume traded is US $1.5 Billion or ₹10,000 Crores Asian Development Bank listing the bonds on India International Exchange.
